data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: In my opinion, technology has positively affected our communication and the way we make relationships and maintain them. Despite some adverse effects, most of us enjoy the positive things the technology has brought for us. In the past, the ways of interaction were limited. Unleash your imagination; if you want to speak with your friend, you will have to go directly to his house or send him a mail, which may take a few days to get a response. Nowadays, it is quite easy to interact with your relatives -and even with the government and organizations- either by emails, mobiles, chatting, etc. and I think that this has improved the relationships and enhanced them. Besides personal communications, official and business communications have also become easier. Email campaign offers a good marketing opportunity for business owners, and people can complain about a certain thing using emails without exposing their identity. (149 words)
data.referenceText: In what ways has social media made networking easier or more effective?
data.referenceTranslate: 社交媒体在哪些方面让社交变得更容易或更有效?
